definition: basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Place a plant on your desk?
Grandpa grows several pots of flower on the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷在露台上养了几盆花。

sentences.english: In our case, it's going to be the group of flowers in the front of the taxi cab.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里使用出租车前面有那盆花的那个图像。

sentences.english: Park trees planted flowers, potted and decorative during which a large number.
sentences.chinese: 园内遍植树木花卉，并以大量盆花点缀其间。

sentences.english: Don't move those flowerpots back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 你别来回摆弄那几盆花了。

sentences.english: And there are two flowers on my window .
sentences.chinese: 而且有两盆花在我的窗户上。

sentences.english: Originally basin of flowers on a neighbor's balcony.
sentences.chinese: 原来是邻居家阳台上那盆花开了。

sentences.english: The potted flower has withered, and the leaves have all drooped.
sentences.chinese: 那盆花蔫儿了，叶子都倒垂了下来。

sentences.english: The first raised flower is asparagus.
The photo shows busy shoppers buying potted flowers and plant accessories.
sentences.chinese: 图为人们在此选购盆花和花器的情形。

sentences.english: Tomorrow I might eat another houseplant.
sentences.chinese: 明天我准备再吃掉一盆花。
